name: The Melancholy of an Outlier
description:
Warning: Okay so, this game works on my computer but a few friends are having issues with it. If the game doesn't work for you, please let me know what resolution you're playing on so I can try to fix it in future versions. Also, the MAC build is untested so I'm sorry if it doesn't work.

This game was a 2 week uni project that I am going to continue working on in the near future. We were to make a game about personal experiences, so I chose to make a game that tries to convey the feeling of being LGBT. Specifically, trying to hide that fact from your parents.

I'm sorry for the bad art, I'll replace it eventually but I ran out of time because of bugs and other stuff. I'll also be adding more to the game over time as well.

Please enjoy!
